    WWDC 2009 Attendee Bash: CAKE

    15 Jun 2009 #

    That’s Pablo Lopez and me at the WWDC Attendee Bash. Pablo is the guy in the green jacket, I’m in the Apple track jacket holding up my camera next to himI am back from WWDC. I’ve got lots of things to write about, I just need to verify what is public and what I cannot discuss just yet.


    In the meantime here are a couple of Voice Memo clips taken during the CAKE performance on June 11’s WWDC Attendee Bash event.
